body:
# Components

## Application Security Management (IAST)

* :bug: Fix NullPointerException in ApplicationModuleImpl (#9879 - @jandro996)
* :bug: Fix issue with call sites on constructors without DUP bytecode (#9698 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :bug: Fix NullPointerException in ObjectIntrospection (#9878 - @jandro996)
* :bug: Rename request body sample rate config variable (#9791 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bug: Ensure blocking exceptions are propagated for SSRF (#9790 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Add support for API Security Custom Data Classification (#9710 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Update telemetry tags in API10 (#9708 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Upgrade libddwaf to 17.1.0 (#9486 - @sezen-datadog)

## Build & Tooling

* :broom: Make `akka-http-10.6` module optional to simplify local build. See `BUILDING.md` for akka token configuration. (#9767 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :bug: Fix NullPointerException in Jacoco coverage report merge logic (#9803 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Bump default Jacoco version used by Test Optimization to 0.8.14 (#9738 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Add config source reading from Test Optimization remote environment (#9701 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Lower logging level for RepoIndex error (#9697 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Crash tracking

* :sparkles: Send ping message (#9804 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Improve OS version parsing (#9785 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Use arrays for tags and send data schema version (#9763 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Extract library name and address from native error reports (#9721 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::broom: Forward wellknown runtime and process tags in crash reports (#9719 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Add origin header to crashtracking telemetry (#9685 - @amarziali)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :sparkles: Add Data Streams Monitoring support for IBM MQ in JMS/Jakarta Messaging (#9768 - @roisinlh)

## Database Monitoring

* :sparkles: Add option to JDBC instrumentation to always append DBM comment (#9798 - @na-ji)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :bug: Fix logging when uninstrumenting cannot happen (#9851 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Extract line information as injectible lines (#9850 - @jpbempel)
* :zap::broom: Optimize method probe without condition (#9834 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix trigger probe and tests (#9828 - @jpbempel)
* :zap::broom: Optimize line probe without condition (#9787 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix possible IndexOutOfBoundsException in ExceptionReplay (#9771 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add support for Guava and FastUtil (#9727 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add Capture Expressions (#9694 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Truncate large exception message when serialized (#9686 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Throttle warning log when resolving probe (#9675 - @jpbempel)

## JMX fetch

* :sparkles: Clean up JMXFetch job on thread interrupt (#9788 - @PerfectSlayer)

## ML Observability (LLMObs)

* :bug: Limit writer logs only when LLMObs is enabled (#9781 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :bug::zap: Fix CPU overhead in LLMObs eval processor  (#9765 - @XG-xin)

## Metrics

* :sparkles: Drop rare sampling support on CSS (#9776 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Fix client stats payload (#9743 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Avoid calculating stats if dropping is disabled (#9742 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Enable client side stats by default (#9740 - @amarziali)

## Profiling

* :bug: Bump ddprof to 1.34.0 (#9865 - @zhengyu123)
* :bug: Keep generic signature aligned when adding `TaskWrapper` interface (#9794 - @mcculls)
* :bug: Protect exception advices from NoClassDefFound (#9769 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Use 'vm' stackwalker as default for java profiler (#9722 - @jbachorik)

## Tracer core

* :broom: Simplify InstanceStore API (#9861 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: ðŸªž 9757 - Avoid pending queue wedge if tracer flare is generated multiple times (#9840 - @deejgregor - thanks for the contribution!)
* :sparkles: Add span builder reuse variable (#9839 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Disambiguate normalizeTag from normalizeTagValue (#9816 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Protect intercepted null traces from NPE (#9797 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Safely set context classloader on final blocks (#9795 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Add quick 'datadog.' prefix check before applying delegation fix (#9793 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: Include dd-instrument-java (#9792 - @mcculls)
* :bug: Avoid UnsatisfiedLinkError when constructing statsd client (#9789 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Use common method to determine telemetry intake url (#9786 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Exclude safeParse errors from telemetry (#9770 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Simplify InstanceStore implementation to use simple, synchronized HashMaps (#9739 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: Add support for service discovery using JNA (#9705 - @raphaelgavache)
* :broom: Replace jctools NonBlockingHashMap with ConcurrentHashMap (#9700 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Upgrade byte-buddy to 1.17.7 (#9692 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: Upgrade asm to 9.9 (#9684 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Create shared DD intake HTTP client (#9660 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Introduce NativeLoader (#9625 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Migrate querying of environment variables to `ConfigHelper` (#9620 - @mhlidd)
* :sparkles::zap: Reuse SpanBuilder within a Thread (#9537 - @dougqh)

## Tracer public API

* :sparkles: Migrate querying of environment variables to `ConfigHelper` (#9620 - @mhlidd)
* :sparkles::book: Implement Config Inversion with default strictness of `Warning` (#9539 - @mhlidd)

# Instrumentations

## Apache Spark instrumentation

* :bug: Fix muzzle mismatch causing Spark jobs on Databricks 17.3 to not be instrumented (#9872 - @aboitreaud)
* :sparkles: Extract SparkPlan product and append to trace (#9783 - @charlesmyu)

## JDBC instrumentation

* :bug: Avoid NPE while accessing JDBC metadata URL (#9815 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Add option to JDBC instrumentation to always append DBM comment (#9798 - @na-ji)
* :bug: Fix generic url parsing in JDBC instrumentation (#9777 - @vandonr)

## OpenTelemetry instrumentation

* :bug: Fix OpenTelemetry span events (#9864 - @ValentinZakharov)
* :bug: Normalize behavior of OTel spans created from custom instrumentation and trace annotations (#9759 - @mhlidd)
* :sparkles: Avoid allocating a tracing context when not fully extracted (#9693 - @amarziali)

## All other instrumentations

* :bug: Avoid NPE on FinatraInstrumentation (#9760 - @amarziali)
